wethebestOLS.logit.logit.standardErrorsLogit(optimization, Y, X, bbeta)¶

This retrieves standard errors.

Parameters:
  • optimization – Function that computes the parameter optimization
  • Y – Array of N x 1 ones and zeros
  • X – parameters of the function (K,1)
  • bbeta – parameters of the function (K,1)
Returns:

  • sd – standard deviation
  • se – standard errors
  • ci – confidence intervals
